attributes.action: introduce a mandatory prison sentence of at least 2-3 years for road users who cause death by dangerous driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request the government consult on introducing laws for a minimum mandatory prison sentence of at least 2-3 years for drivers who cause a fatality through dangerous driving, driving without due care and attention, driving under the influence of alcohol and or drugs as well as other motoring offences including those who risk innocent road users lives by driving without having obtained the correct catagory licence, those who drive without insurance and those who operate vehicles that are not in a roadworth state.
